Ngāti Tūkorehe (Ngāti Raukawa):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tūkorehe (Ngāti Raukawa ki Waikato):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tūkorehe (Ngāti Raukawa ki te tonga):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tūkōrehu:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tūranga:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Tararua te maunga, ko Manawatū te awa, ko Tainui te waka, ko Ngāti Raukawa te iwi, ko Ngāti Tūranga te hapū, ko Paranui te marae, ko Hinewaha te wharekai. Kei Himatangi te marae o Paranui e noho ana, koirā te kāinga o Ngāti Tūranga i ēnei rā.

Ngāti Tūwhakahewa:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Ueroa:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Upokoiti:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Uruhina (Ngāti Raukawa ki Waikato):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Waewae (Ngāti Raukawa ki te tonga):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Wahineiti:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Waihurihia:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Waipare:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Wairangi (Ngāti Raukawa):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Wehiwehi (Ngāti Raukawa):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Wehiwehi (Ngāti Raukawa ki Waikato):
Ko Ngāti Wehiwehi tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka. 

Ngāti Wehiwehi (Ngāti Raukawa ki te tonga):
Ko tētehi o ngā iwi E whai pānga ana kia Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētehi e noho ana, kei Manawatū-Horowhenua ētehi. I Heke tautika mai a Ngāti Wehiwehi i a Whatihua rāua ko Ruaputāhanga. Nā ka noho te tūpuna O Wehiwehi a Whatihua hei tuakana ki te pāpā o Raukawa a Tūrongo. Heoi i roto i ngā tau ka whakamoea ngā kāwai o Ngāti Wehiwehi ki ngā pāpāringa o Ngāti Raukawa, ā katahi ngā iwi nei ka heke ngātahi mai, i te takiwā o ngā rautau 1820-1830. Ā ko ētehi wahanga i noho atu ki ngā tahatika o te awa o Waikawa me āna pekanga. Ko ētehi atu i nohoia i ngā tahatika o te awa o Manawatū mai i Himatangi ki Te Papaioea, pīnaki nei ki ō rātou tuakana a Ngāti Kauwhata. Na wai rā, na wai rā ka tangi apakura nei a Rangitāne mo ō rātou whenua, i korā i tukua te mana kia rātou, i kona i huri te aroaro a te nuinga o Ngāti Wehiwehi ki ō rātou whenua i ngā tahatika o te awa o Waikawa, me ōna pekanga a Manakau, a Manga-Huia, a Takapū rātou ko Tikorangi. A i roto i ngā tau ka whakaraukawa ai te noho o te iwi nei. Heoi e mau tonu ana a Ngāti Wehiwehi ki tāna mana motuhake otirā he hapū ake āna koia ko Ngāti Te Rangitāwhia, ko Ngāti Tamatātai, ko Ngāti Pīhaka, ko Ngāti Pareahotea me Ngāti Te Ihiihi

Ngāti Whakatere (Ngāti Raukawa ki te tonga):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Whakatere (Tainui):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Whāita (Ngāti Raukawa ki Waikato):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Whāita (Ngāti Raukawa ki te tonga):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Rereahu:
Ko ' tētehi o ngā iwi maha ka heke i a Tainui waka. Ko ' tetehi tupuna tapu, he tohunga, he rangatira. Na te tupuna nei a ko te toa rongonui, ko tana tamaiti a Maniapoto, e puta ai te iwi o Ngāti Maniapoto. 

Ngāti Apakura:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.
Maumahara ki te Maara tapu.
I te raa o mua ka puta te maara tapu o Waikato. Ko Rangiaowhia te paa. Ka hoatu te whenua tapu noo a Waharoa (Ngati Haaua) ki Ngati Apakura raaua ko Ngati Hinetu (Ngati Maniapoto) i 1825. I muri i te patunga ki a Rangianewa (he whanaunga ai ki a Potatau) E. 2018. Wiremu Tamihana Rangatira. Noo reira, ka hoatu te whenua a Rangiaowhia moo te maungarongo ki a Waikato. 
E tipu ake te maara o Rangiaowhia. He kai maha moo te motu o Te Ika a Maaui. Ka hanga ngaa waahine tapu ki roto i te maara. He mara o Rongo-maa-taane. Ka haere koutou ki te maara i runga i te aroha me awhi. Ehara koutou ai e haere ki te maara i runga i te hinengaro riri. I te mea ai he kai moo te mokopuna tonu, he kai o awhi, tautoko me murua ngaa hara. He mauri noo te hinengaro me the manawa e ihi ki te wai me e haere ki te maara. 
Noo reira, Ko Ngati Apakura te tangata o te maara i runga i te maungarongo. 

Ngāti Awa o Runga-o-Te Rangi:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hari:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hinetewai:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hinetū (Ngāti Maniapoto):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hounuku:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Huiao:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Mangapū te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Kaputuhi:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Tirohia tona ipu wharangi kei www.kaputuhi.maori.nz. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei te Rohe Potae e noho ana. Mo Ngati Kaputuhi, me penei te korero, ko Tainui te waka, ko Ngati Maniapoto te iwi, ko Pukeroa te maunga, ko Mangapu te awa, ko Parekura te tupuna.
Kia harere tonu te kawai whakapapa:
Na Maniapoto ko Te Kawairirangi;
Na Te Kawairirangi ko Rungaterangi;
Na Rungaterangi ko Maniaopetini;
Na Maniaopetini ko Taitengahue.
Ka moe a Taitengahue i a Kaputuhi,
Ka puta ko Parekura, nana ko Ngati Kaputuhi!

Ngāti Kinohaku:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Uekaha:

Ngāti Urunumia:

Ngāti Mahuta:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hine (Ngāti Mahuta):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Marae:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Naho:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Puhiawe:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hikairo (Tainui), he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Naunau (Ngāti Mahuta):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Ngāhia:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Rangitaka:
Ko tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he hapū kei Tahaaroa e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Kooraha te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hikairo (Tainui):
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Reko (Ngāti Mahuta):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Wehi me Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Rārua:
Ko he iwi kei Te Tau Ihu o Te Waka a Maui e noho ana. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Te Huaki:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tū (Ngāti Mahuta):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Pareteata (Ngāti Rārua):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rārua, he iwi kei Te Tau Ihu o Te Waka a Maui e noho ana. Ko Tainui te waka.

Te Patupō:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Mahuta, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Taupiri te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tūrangawaewae te marae, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tūrangapeke:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rārua, he iwi kei Te Tau Ihu o Te Waka a Maui e noho ana. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hourua:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Māhanga, ā, ko Ngāti Māhanga tonu tētahi o ngā hapū o Waikato. Ko Hourua he uri whakaheke, no Mahuta,no Maahanga.ko ngoona tungane ko Wharetipeti, ko Tapa-Ue ngaa tino Rangatira, o ngaati Maahuta, ngaa tupuna o Pootatau Te Wherowhero. 
ka moea te tamati pootiki o Haua, araa ko Pukauae, i runga i te matenga o Pukauae, i hoki aa Hourua ki waenganui, i toona ake iwi, ka whaia te ara whakapapa o toona Tupuna , a Atutahi. araa te tamaiti o Maahanga, kei ohiopopoko toona kainga noho, kei reira tonu ngoona uri, kei Ngaati Hourua e nohonoho ana kei waenganui o Ngati Haua, Kei Maungatautari, kei te whare waananga ko Ngati Mahanga,Te Rua o Tuheitia. kei Oomaero ko Ngati Hourua, Ko Te Awaitaia, Ko Maahanga-Hourua.
He uri whakaheke aa Te Awaitaia ia Hourua.

Ngāti Taiwa:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maniapoto. Ko Ngāti Maniapoto he iwi nui, kei Waikato e noho ana. Ko Kakepuku te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Māhanga Hourua:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Māhanga, ā, ko Ngāti Māhanga tonu tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Ngāmuri:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Māhanga, ā, ko Ngāti Māhanga tonu tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Ngārape:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Māhanga, ā, ko Ngāti Māhanga tonu tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Ruru (Ngāti Māhanga):
Ko - He uri na Ruru, tetahi o nga tupuna whaea o Waikato. Ko ia te tamahine a Koroki me Kahurere. Ka moe a ia ki a Korako, a ko raua nga matua o Waenganui. Ko Ruru me Korako nga uri o Mahanga, te tupuna nui o Waikato (tirohia te papa whakapapa). I noho ana uri i Nukuhau Pa, tata ki Kirikiriroa. I muri i to ratou whenua i riro i te 1864, i noho tetahi o te wahanga i Whatawhata ( Ngāti Māhanga) me tetahi atu wahanga i Paraawera (Ngāti Raukawa).

Ngāti Tohe:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Māhanga, ā, ko Ngāti Māhanga tonu tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Raukawa. Ko Ngāti Raukawa he iwi nui, kei Waikato ētahi e noho ana, kei Raukawa moana ētahi. Ko Maungatautari te maunga, ko Waikato te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Hauraki (iwi):
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, ā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāi Tai ki Hauraki:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, ā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hako:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hei:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, ā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Paoa:
Ko / Ngāti Pāoa tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, o Waikato hoki, ā, ko ngā uri o Paoa. Ko Tainui te waka. Ko Ngāti Paoa ngā uri o te tupuna, o Paoa. Ko tētahi āhuatanga nui mōna, mō Paoa, e pā ana ki ana moenga wāhine. Nō tētahi o ngā wāhine o Paoa, nō Tauhākari, ka herea a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Waikato. Nō Hauraki kē tētahi o ana wāhine, ko Tukutuku tērā. No konei ka herea ai a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Hauraki. Ko ērā ngā taha e rua o Ngāti Paoa; he iwi nō Waikato, he iwi anō nō Hauraki. 

Ngāti Pūkenga ki Hauraki:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, ā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tamatehura:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, ā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tamaterā:
Ko tētehi o ngā Marutuahu iwi o Hauraki, ā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui raua ko Mihirawhiti, nga matua a Marutuahu. 
Ko Marutuahu i moe ia a Paremoehau kua puta ko Tamatepo (Ngati Rongo U) i muri ko Tamatera (Ngati Tamatera) i muri ko Whanaunga (Ngati Whanaunga). Te hoa wahine tokorua a Marutuahu ko Hineuranga kua puta ko Te Ngakohua (Ngati Maru) i muri ake ko Taurukapakapa. Ko tirara nga uri o Taurukapakapa i roto i nga rarangi whakapapa o ona tuakana katoa.
Ko Tumorewhitia te hoa wahine tokotahi a Tamatera, kua puta ko Putahi. Ko Ruawehia te hoa wahine tokorua a Tamatera, kua puta ko Paretera, i muri ko Taharua, i muri ko Taiuru, i muri ko Manuiti, i muri ko Taireinga, i muri ko Honekai, i muri ko Kunawhea. Ko Hineuranga te hoa wahine tokotoru a Tamatera, kua puta ko Te Aokurinahe, i muri ko Te Hihi. 
Nga uri o Ngati Tamatera no enei tamariki katoa.

Ngāti Tara Tokanui:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Ohinemuri te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Whanaunga:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, ā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Kuia (Tainui):
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Kōkako:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Tahinga:

Ngāti Tama:
Ko he iwi kei Taranaki ētahi, kei Wharekauri ētahi, kei Te Wai-pounamu ētahi e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Tamainu:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Tamainupō:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Calamus:
Ko Calamus he momo o te whānau o ngā Arecaceae. He ahua rite ēnei tipu ki te Nīkau o Aotearoa, engari he tipu kake rākau ēnei. Ko te ingoa reo Pākehā he "rattan palm".

Ngāti Tamaoho:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki nga marae o Mangatangi, Whaataapaka, me Ngaa Hau e Whaa, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Taupiri ki Waikato:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Te Ata:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Tīpā:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Wairere:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Whāwhākia:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Āti Hau:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Wai-o-Hua:
Ko he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ko Calamus dianbaiensis he momo o te puninga huaota Calamus. He ahua rite tēnei tipu ki te Nīkau o Aotearoa, engari he tipu kake rākau tēnei. Ko te ingoa reo Pākehā he "rattan palm".

Calamus didymocarpus:
Ko Calamus didymocarpus he momo o te puninga huaota Calamus. He ahua rite tēnei tipu ki te Nīkau o Aotearoa, engari he tipu kake rākau tēnei. Ko te ingoa reo Pākehā he "rattan palm".

Ngā Tauiwi (Ngāti Maru):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hape:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Hauāuru:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Horoawatea:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Matau (Ngāti Maru):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Naunau (Ngāti Maru):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Paeahi:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hako Ko Ngāti Hako te Iwi tūturu o Hauraki. Ka tae ami a Ngāti hako i mua i te taenga mai o ngā waka. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. 

Ngāti Patu:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Pū:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki.
Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Pūkareao:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Rāhiri Tumutumu:
Ko he iwi e noho ana ki Te Aroha, Hauraki. Ki ētahi, he iwi motuhake; ki ētahi, he hapū kē o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Taua:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Maru. Ko Ngāti Maru he iwi nui, nō Hauraki; ko Marutūahu, te tama a Hotunui, tō rātou tupuna. Kei Hauraki taua iwi e noho ana i Te Ika-a-Māui o Aotearoa. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa. Ko Tainui te waka.

Te Whakatōhea (Ngāti Hako):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hako. Ko Ngāti Hako tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Kiriwera (Ngāti Hako):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hako. Ko Ngāti Hako tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Koi:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hako. Ko Ngāti Hako tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tāwhaki (Ngāti Hako):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hako. Ko Ngāti Hako tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Kōheru:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hei. Ko Ngāti Hei tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tao:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hei. Ko Ngāti Hei tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Te Hora:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hei. Ko Ngāti Hei tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Whakaruku:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Hei. Ko Ngāti Hei tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tai:
Ko tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki. Ko ngā tūpuna o Ngāti Tai i tae mai ki a Hauraki i runga i a Tainui waka, i te whitinga mai o taua waka ki a Tāmaki-makau-rau me Tikapa Moana hoki; ko Ngāti Tai te tuatahi o ngā iwi o Tainui waka i noho ki Hauraki. Ko Te Keteanatāua tētahi o ngā rangatira o Tainui waka i terā wā, ā, ko Taihauā te tama a Te Keteanatāua. Nō Taihauā i puta mai te iwi nei, a Ngāti Tai. Ko Taikehu tētahi atu o ngā tūpuna. I muri ake, i heke mai he rōpu nui o Ngāi Tai ki Hauraki, i haere mai rātou nō Tōrere, ki a Tāmaki-makau-rau, tō rātou haere mai he whakawhanaungatanga ki a Ngāti Tai. 
I te wā a muri ake anō, ka tae mai a Pāoa, tupuna o Ngāti Paoa, ki a Hauraki. Nō reira, ka moea ngā uri o Pāoa ki ngā uri o Ngāti Tai, he nui rawa ngā herenga whakapapa i waenganui i ngā iwi e rua nei. Engari, he kōrero i tuku iho nā te Pākehā te whakaaro "ko Ngāti Tai he hapū o Ngāti Paoa", nā te mea, i te wā o te haerenga mai o ngā Pākehā ki Tāmaki, ko Ngāti Pāoa te iwi nui atu ki a Ngāti Tai o taua rohe. Hei tā Ngāti Tai, hei whanaunga kē rātou ki a rātou. 

Ngāti Te Kōheru:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Paoa. Ko Ngāti Paoa tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, o Waikato. Ko Tainui te waka. Ko Ngāti Paoa ngā uri o te tupuna, o Paoa. Nō tētahi o ngā wāhine o Paoa, nō Tauhākari, ka herea a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Waikato. Nō Hauraki kē tētahi o ana wāhine, ko Tukutuku tērā. No konei ka herea ai a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Hauraki. Ko ērā ngā taha e rua o Ngāti Paoa; he iwi nō Waikato, he iwi anō nō Hauraki. 

Ngāti Tourua:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Paoa. Ko Ngāti Paoa tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, o Waikato. Ko Tainui te waka. Ko Ngāti Paoa ngā uri o te tupuna, o Paoa. Nō tētahi o ngā wāhine o Paoa, nō Tauhākari, ka herea a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Waikato. Nō Hauraki kē tētahi o ana wāhine, ko Tukutuku tērā. No konei ka herea ai a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Hauraki. Ko ērā ngā taha e rua o Ngāti Paoa; he iwi nō Waikato, he iwi anō nō Hauraki.

Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Paoa. Ko Ngāti Paoa tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Hauraki, o Waikato. Ko Tainui te waka. Ko Ngāti Paoa ngā uri o te tupuna, o Paoa. Nō tētahi o ngā wāhine o Paoa, nō Tauhākari, ka herea a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Waikato. Nō Hauraki kē tētahi o ana wāhine, ko Tukutuku tērā. No konei ka herea ai a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Hauraki. Ko ērā ngā taha e rua o Ngāti Paoa; he iwi nō Waikato, he iwi anō nō Hauraki.

Nō tētahi o ngā wāhine o Paoa, nō Tauhākari, ka herea a Ngāti Paoa ki ngā tātai rangatira o Waikato. Nō Hauraki kē tētahi o ana wāhine, ko Tukutuku tērā. Ngāti Whaene:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tahinga. Ko Ngāti Tahinga tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Te Wera:

Ngāti Rua (Ngāti Te Ata):

Ngāti Urupikia o Waikato:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Iwi Ware (Ngāti Te Ata):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Tama ki Taranaki:
Ko he iwi kei Taranaki e noho ana, he hapū hoki o Ngāti Tama, he iwi kei Taranaki ētahi, kei Wharekauri ētahi, kei Te Wai-pounamu ētahi e noho ana. Ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Kainga Ahi:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Tama ki Te Waipounamu:
Ko he iwi kei Te Wai-pounamu e noho ana, he hapū hoki o Ngāti Tama, he iwi kei Taranaki ētahi, kei Wharekauri ētahi, kei Te Wai-pounamu ētahi e noho ana. Ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Kaitapu:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Tama ki Wharekauri:
Ko he iwi kei Wharekauri e noho ana, he hapū hoki o Ngāti Tama, he iwi kei Taranaki ētahi, kei Wharekauri ētahi, kei Te Wai-pounamu ētahi e noho ana. Ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Mauungaunga:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Uri o Te Oro:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Uringahu:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Uriraro:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Whānaupani ki Waikato:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Ata. Ko Ngāti Te Ata tonu tētahi o ngā iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Kiriwera (Ngāti Tamaterā):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Mangō:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Pare (Ngāti Tamaterā):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Pinenga:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Taharua:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tara (Ngāti Tamaterā):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tiroro:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tokanui:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tāwhaki (Ngāti Tamaterā):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Te Matewaru:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Te Māhurehure (Ngāti Tamaterā):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Te Patukirikiri:
Ko tokorua wahanga Iwi tera a Te Patukirikiri. Tetehi atu kei Taitokerau e noho ana, tetehi ano kei Tamaki Makaurau me Hauraki e noho ana hoki. Inaianei, nga iwi enei rereke korua i tenei ra. Ko tenei te korero pakupaku o Te Patukirikiri o Hauraki me Tamaki Makaurau.
Mai ra ano i taenga no Taitokerau ki Tamaki Makaurau a Tawake II. Koia he uri o Tawake, te tupuna aporei o Ngai Tawake. I moe ia a Tawake II ki Te Auwhangarahi o Wai o Hua, Uri o Pou hoki... ka puta atu ra he kotiro ko Tairuhi i muri ake ia, he tane ko Kapetaua. Ka tu a Kapetaua hei rangatira aporei mo Te Patukirikiri. 
I moe ia a Tairuhi ki Tarakumukumu o Wai o Hua... e noho raua kei Kohimarama te Pa o Tarakumukumu. I te taitama a Kapetaua i noho ia ki a raua kei Kohimarama engari i tetehi ra i whakamanioro a Tarakumukumu ki a Kapetaua. Kua hoki ki ona matua kei Oue Pa a Kapetaua i muri ake tera ki te tatari ma tona wa.
Me te aha ko Kapetaua i kohi ia he taua me i patu ia a Tarakumukumu me mau ona manawhenua o tona taokete. Ko enei whenua a Kohimarama, ko Orakei, Ko Rahopara, Ko Motu Waiheke me etehi atu wahi whenua penei a Kiritai. 
Ki noho ana a Kapetaua o enei whenua i rongo ia te korero o te mara rongonui ko Te Rakato kei Moehau. Na reira i whakawhiti atu ia a Tikapa Moana me e mau tenei mara o Ngati Huarere. Kua rata te wahi me noho I reira. Mai taua wa nga uri o Kapetaua e noho ana kei Hauraki me Tamaki Makaurua hoki kua apanoa te wehenga o ana Iwi mai Kapanga.

Te Uri Wha:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaterā. Ko Ngāti Tamaterā tētahi o ngā tino iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Haumia (Ngāti Toa):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Toa (Ngāti Toarangatira). Ko Ngāti Toa tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Tainui. E rua ngā rohe noho a Ngāti Toa; kei Waikato tētahi, kei Raukawa tētahi. He iwi tēnei kei ngā whenua e pātata ana ki Raukawa Moana i waenganui i te Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Wai-pounamu, Aotearoa, e noho ana. Ko Te Rauparaha te rangatira rongonui nō te wā i tae mai ai te Pākehā.

Ngāti Kahutaiki:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Toa (Ngāti Toarangatira). Ko Ngāti Toa tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Tainui. E rua ngā rohe noho a Ngāti Toa; kei Waikato tētahi, kei Raukawa tētahi. He iwi tēnei kei ngā whenua e pātata ana ki Raukawa Moana i waenganui i te Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Wai-pounamu, Aotearoa, e noho ana. Ko Te Rauparaha te rangatira rongonui nō te wā i tae mai ai te Pākehā.

Ngāti Kimihia:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Toa (Ngāti Toarangatira). Ko Ngāti Toa tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Tainui. E rua ngā rohe noho a Ngāti Toa; kei Waikato tētahi, kei Raukawa tētahi. He iwi tēnei kei ngā whenua e pātata ana ki Raukawa Moana i waenganui i te Te Ika-a-Māui me Te Wai-pounamu, Aotearoa, e noho ana. Ko Te Rauparaha te rangatira rongonui nō te wā i tae mai ai te Pākehā.

Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Toa (Ngāti Toarangatira). Ko Ngāti Toa tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Tainui. E rua ngā rohe noho a Ngāti Toa; kei Waikato tētahi, kei Raukawa tētahi. Te Akitai (Ngāti Tamaoho):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaoho, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Waikauri:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Toa (Ngāti Toarangatira). Ko Ngāti Toa tonu tētahi o ngā iwi o Tainui. E rua ngā rohe noho a Ngāti Toa; kei Waikato tētahi, kei Raukawa tētahi. Koheriki:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tamaoho, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Te Wehi:
Ko he iwi kei Aotea moana e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Karioi, ki Okapua, Makomako,Te Papatapu Marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Paipai:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Wehi, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Pakiaka:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Wehi, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Reko (Ngāti Te Wehi):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Te Wehi, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Āmaru:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tīpā, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Rangi ( Ngāti Tīpā):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tīpā, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Te Maungaunga:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tīpā, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Hokopū (Ngāti Whanaunga):
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whanaunga, he iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Karoua:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whanaunga, he iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Korohē:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whanaunga, he iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Te Mateawa:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whanaunga, he iwi o Hauraki, arā, ko ngā uri o Hotunui. Ko Moehau rāua ko Te Aroha ngā maunga, ko Waihou te awa, ko Tainui te waka.

Ngāti Tūmango:
Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Āti Hau, he iwi kei Waikato e noho ana. Ka huri te titiro ki Taupiri maunga, ki te awa o Waikato, ki Tūrangawaewae marae, ana, ko ngā uri o Tainui waka.

Ngāti Pēhi (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Pūtauaki):
Ko Ngāti Pēhi (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Pūtauaki) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui ki Aotearoa.

Ngāti Pou (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Pūtauaki):
Ko Ngāti Pou (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Pūtauaki) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui ki Aotearoa.

Ngāti Umutahi (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Pūtauaki):
Ko Ngāti Umutahi (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Pūtauaki) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui ki Aotearoa.

Te Tāwera (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Pūtauaki):
Ko Te Tāwera (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Pūtauaki) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui ki Aotearoa.

Ngāti Hikairo (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Tongariro):
Ko Ngāti Hikairo (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Tongariro) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Hinemihi (Ngāti Tūwharetoa):
Ko Ngāti Hinemihi (Ngāti Tūwharetoa) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Hinemihi (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Tongariro):
Ko Ngāti Hinemihi (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Tongariro) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Kurapoto:
Ko Ngāti Kurapoto tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Kurauia:
Ko Ngāti Kurauia tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Manunui (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Tongariro):
Ko Ngāti Manunui (Ngāti Tūwharetoa ki Tongariro) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Meremere:
Ko Ngāti Meremere tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Moekino:
Ko Ngāti Moekino tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Tūwharetoa, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāi Tūhourangi:
Ko Ngāi Tūhourangi tētehi o ngā hapū o Tūhourangi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Hinemihi (Tūhourangi):
Ko Ngāti Hinemihi (Tūhourangi) tētehi o ngā hapū o Tūhourangi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ko Ngāti Te Āpiti (Tūhourangi) tētehi o ngā hapū o Tūhourangi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ko Ngāti Uruhina (Tūhourangi) tētehi o ngā hapū o Tūhourangi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ko Ngāti Whakahemo (Waitaha) tētehi he iwi o Mataatua waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Wāhiao:
Ko Ngāti Wāhiao tētehi o ngā hapū o Tūhourangi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Āpū Moana:
Ko Ngāti Āpū Moana tētehi o ngā hapū o Tūhourangi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Tūhourangi:
Ko Tūhourangi tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro.

Ko Waitaha (Te Arawa) tētehi o ngā hapū o Tūhourangi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ko Ngāti Mākino (Ngāti Pikiao) tētehi iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.
"He paruparu ngā kai, he taniwha ngā tangata"

Ko Ngāti Taharangi tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Kea me Ngāti Tūara, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Te Āpiti (Ngāti Rangiteaorere):
Ko Ngāti Te Āpiti (Ngāti Rangiteaorere) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangiteaorere, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti o Te Whaiwha:
Ko Ngāti o Te Whaiwha tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangiteaorere, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Hinerangi (Ngāti Rangitihi):
Ko Ngāti Hinerangi (Ngāti Rangitihi) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangitihi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Mahi:
Ko Ngāti Mahi tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangitihi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Rongomai (Ngāti Rangitihi):
Ko Ngāti Rongomai (Ngāti Rangitihi) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangitihi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Kererū:
Ko Ngāti Kererū tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangiwewehi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Pūkeko (Ngāti Rangiwewehi):
Ko Ngāti Pūkeko (Ngāti Rangiwewehi) tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangiwewehi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Te Manawa:
Ko Ngāti Te Manawa tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangiwewehi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Te Okotahi:
Ko Ngāti Te Okotahi tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangiwewehi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Te Wai:
Ko Ngāti Te Wai tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangiwewehi, he iwi o Te Arawa waka, nō te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Hurungaterangi:
Ko Ngāti Hurungaterangi tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Ngāraranui:
Ko Ngāti Ngāraranui tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Pūkāki:
Ko Ngāti Pūkāki tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Rangiiwaho:
Ko Ngāti Rangiiwaho tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Whāoa:
Ko Ngāti Whāoa tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Tahu:
Ko Ngāti Tahu tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Tū:
Ko Ngāti Tū tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Tuara:
Ko Ngāti Tuara tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Rangitunaeke:
Ko Ngāti Rangitunaeke tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Roro-o-Te Rangi:
Ko Ngāti Roro-o-Te Rangi tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Tae-o-Tū:
Ko Ngāti Tae-o-Tū tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Taiwere:
Ko Ngāti Taiwere tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Tunohopu:
Ko Ngāti Tunohopu tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Tura:
Ko Ngāti Tura tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Tūmahaurangi:
Ko Ngāti Tūmahaurangi tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Whatumairangi:
Ko Ngāti Whatumairangi tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Whakaue. Ko Ngāti Whakaue tonu he iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko Ngongotahā te maunga; ko Rotorua-nui-a-Kahu te moana.

Ngāti Kea me Ngāti Tūara:
Ko Ngāti Kea me Ngāti Tūara tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Pikiao:
Ko Ngāti Pikiao tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Rangiteaorere:
Ko Ngāti Rangiteaorere tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Rangitihi:
Ko Ngāti Rangitihi tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Rangiwewehi:
Ko Ngāti Rangiwewehi tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Tara-a-Whai:
Ko Ngāti Tara-a-Whai tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Ngāti Uenuku Kōpako:
Ko Ngāti Uenuku Kōpako tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Tapuika:
Ko Tapuika tētehi o ngā iwi o Te Arawa waka. Ko te rohe o taua waka mai i Maketū ki Tongariro. 

Nukutere:
Ko Nukutere te waka o ngā tūpuna o Pananehu, he iwi o Te Ika-a-Māui.

Aotea (waka):
Ko Aotea te waka tupuna o Ngā Rauru, Ngā Ruahine, Ngāti Ruanui, Ngāti Tamaahuroa, Rāhotu o Taranaki me Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi. Ko Turi te kaihautū.

Te Papatapu Marae:
Ko Te Papatapu Marae he marae o Ngāti Te Wehi, he iwi o Tainui waka. Ko Kariori te maunga, Ko Aotea te moana, ko Ngāti Te Wehi te hapū, ko Te Papatapu te marae, Ko Te Wehi-kai-wakarua te wharekai, ko Parewhakarukuruku te wharenui. 
He marae tēnei kei Waitere Road, Aotea.

Ngā Pae Rangi:
Ko Ngā Pae Rangi tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi. Ko Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi tonu he iwi e noho ana kei ngā tahataha o te awa o Whanganui, kei te hauāuru o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa. Ko Aotea te waka; ko Ruapehu te maunga; ko Whanganui te awa; ko Turi te tangata.

Ngā Poutama:
Ko Ngā Poutama tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi. Ko Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi tonu he iwi e noho ana kei ngā tahataha o te awa o Whanganui, kei te hauāuru o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa. Ko Aotea te waka; ko Ruapehu te maunga; ko Whanganui te awa; ko Turi te tangata.

Ngāti Hau (Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi):
Ko Ngāti Hau (Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi) tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi. Ko Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi tonu he iwi e noho ana kei ngā tahataha o te awa o Whanganui, kei te hauāuru o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa. Ko Aotea te waka; ko Ruapehu te maunga; ko Whanganui te awa; ko Turi te tangata.

Rangituhia:
Ko Rangituhia tētehi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Rangi. Ko Ngāti Rangi te iwi e noho ana kei te maru o Ruapehu, kei te puku o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Reremai:
Ko Ngāti Reremai tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi. Ko Te Āti Haunui-a-Pāpārangi tonu he iwi e noho ana kei ngā tahataha o te awa o Whanganui, kei te hauāuru o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa. Ko Aotea te waka; ko Ruapehu te maunga; ko Whanganui te awa; ko Turi te tangata.

Ngāti Ruanui:
Ko Ngāti Ruanui he iwi e noho ana kei te rohe o Pātea, kei te hauāuru o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa. E 5,286 te taupori i te 2001. Ko Aotea te waka; ko Taranaki te maunga; ko Waingongoro te awa; ko Turi te tangata; ko Ngāti Ruanui te iwi.

Ko tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Ruanui. Ko Ngāti Ruanui tonu he iwi e noho ana kei te rohe o Pātea, kei te hauāuru o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa. Ko Aotea te waka; ko Taranaki te maunga; ko Waingongoro te awa; ko Turi te tangata; ko Ngāti Ruanui te iwi.

Ngāti Haupoto:
Ko Ngāti Haupoto tētahi o ngā hapū o Rāhotu o Taranaki. Ko Rāhotu o Taranaki tonu he iwi e noho ana kei te rohe o Taranaki, kei te hauāuru o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa. Ko Kurahaupō te waka; ko Taranaki te maunga; ko Rāhotu o Taranaki te iwi.

Rāhotu o Taranaki:
Ko Rāhotu o Taranaki he iwi e noho ana kei te rohe o Taranaki, kei te hauāuru o Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa. Ko Aotea te waka; ko Taranaki te maunga; ko Rāhotu o Taranaki te iwi. 

Te Whānau-a-Tauwhao:
Ko Te Whānau-a-Tauwhao tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Te Rangi. Ko Ngāi Te Rangi tonu he iwi nō Tauranga-moana. Ko Mauao te Maunga; ko Ngāiterangi te Iwi; ko Mātaatua te waka; ko Te Rangihouhiri te tangata. 

Te Ngare:
Ko Te Ngare tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Te Rangi. Ko Ngāi Te Rangi tonu he iwi nō Tauranga-moana. Ko Mauao te Maunga; ko Ngāiterangi te Iwi; ko Mātaatua te waka; ko Te Rangihouhiri te tangata. 

Ngāti Whare (Ngāi Te Rangi):
Ko Ngāti Whare (Ngāi Te Rangi) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Te Rangi. Ko Ngāi Te Rangi tonu he iwi nō Tauranga-moana. Ko Mauao te Maunga; ko Ngāiterangi te Iwi; ko Mātaatua te waka; ko Te Rangihouhiri te tangata. 

Ngāti Tauaiti:
Ko Ngāti Tauaiti tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Te Rangi. Ko Ngāi Te Rangi tonu he iwi nō Tauranga-moana. Ko Mauao te Maunga; ko Ngāiterangi te Iwi; ko Mātaatua te waka; ko Te Rangihouhiri te tangata. 

Ngāti Tapu:
Ko Ngāti Tapu tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Te Rangi. Ko Ngāi Te Rangi tonu he iwi nō Tauranga-moana. Ko Mauao te Maunga; ko Ngāiterangi te Iwi; ko Mātaatua te waka; ko Te Rangihouhiri te tangata. 

Ngāti Pūkenga (Ngāi Te Rangi):
Ko Ngāti Pūkenga (Ngāi Te Rangi) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Te Rangi. Ko Ngāi Te Rangi tonu he iwi nō Tauranga-moana. Ko Mauao te Maunga; ko Ngāiterangi te Iwi; ko Mātaatua te waka; ko Te Rangihouhiri te tangata.

Ngāi Tama Whariua:

Ngā Pōtiki (Ngāi Te Rangi):
Ko Ngā Pōtiki (Ngāi Te Rangi) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Te Rangi. Ko Ngāi Te Rangi tonu he iwi nō Tauranga-moana. Ko Mauao te Maunga; ko Ngāiterangi te Iwi; ko Mātaatua te waka; ko Te Rangihouhiri te tangata. 

Hāmua:
Ko Hāmua tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngā Maihi (Ngāi Tūhoe):
Ko Ngā Maihi (Ngāi Tūhoe) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāi Tama Tuhirae:
Ko Ngāi Tama Tuhirae tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāi Te Paenga:
Ko Ngāi Te Paenga tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāi Te Riu:
Ko Ngāi Te Riu tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāi Tūranga (Ngāi Tūhoe):
Ko Ngāi Tūranga (Ngāi Tūhoe) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāriki (Ngāi Tūhoe):
Ko Ngāriki (Ngāi Tūhoe) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāti Haka:
Ko Ngāti Haka tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko tōna nōhanga tūturu ko Te Houhī, he wāhi nō roto mai i te whenua tikitū o Kūhāwāea. E ai ki ngā kōrero, ko Tama-ki-Hikurangi te maunga, ko Rangitāiki te awa, ko Te Houhī te kainga tūturu, ko Ngāti Haka te hapū. 

Ngāti Hinekura (Ngāti Tūhoe):
Ko Ngāti Hinekura (Ngāti Tūhoe) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Panekire te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau o nga tipuna, ko Waikaretaheke te awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāti Huri (Ngāi Tūhoe):
Ko Ngāti Huri (Ngāi Tūhoe) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāti Kahu (Ngāi Tūhoe):
Ko Ngāti Kahu (Ngāi Tūhoe) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tūhoe. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe tonu he iwi kei Te Urewera e noho ana. Ko Maungapōhatu te maunga tapu , ko Waikaremoana te wai kaukau, ko Tauranga, ko Ōhinemataroa, ko Rangitāiki, ko Whirinaki ngā awa. Ko Ngāi Tūhoe te iwi.

Ngāti Awa ki Pōneke:
Ko Ngāti Awa ki Pōneke tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Awa; ko ngā mea kei Te Whanga-nui-a-Tara e noho ana. Ko Ngāti Awa tonu he iwi kei te rohe o Whakatāne e noho ana. Ko Pūtauaki te maunga, ko Mātaatua te waka.

Ngāti Awa ki Tāmaki-makau-rau:
Ko Ngāti Awa ki Tāmaki-makau-rau tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Awa; ko ngā mea kei Tāmaki-makau-rau e noho ana. Ko Ngāti Awa tonu he iwi kei te rohe o Whakatāne e noho ana. Ko Pūtauaki te maunga, ko Mātaatua te waka.

Ngāriki (Te Whānau-a-Apanui):
Ko Ngāriki (Te Whānau-a-Apanui) tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Horomoana:
Ko Ngāti Horomoana tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Horowai (Te Whānau-a-Apanui):
Ko Ngāti Horowai (Te Whānau-a-Apanui) tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Paeākau:
Ko Ngāti Paeākau tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Te Whānau-a-Hara-ā-Waka:
Ko Te Whānau-a-Hara-ā-Waka tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Ko Te Whānau-a-Hikarukutai tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Ko Te Whānau-a-Hine Te Kahu tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Te Whānau-a-Kahurautao:
Ko Te Whānau-a-Kahurautao tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Ko Te Whānau-a-Tūtawake tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whānau-a-Apanui. Ko Te Whānau-a-Apanui tonu he iwi nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Aotearoa.

Ngāi Tama Haua:
Ko Ngāi Tama Haua tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whakatōhea. Ko Te Whakatōhea tonu he iwi mai i Te Moana-a-Tairongo (Ōhiwa), ki Ōpōtiki, tae noa ki Ōpape e noho ana

Ngāi Tamatea (Te Whakatōhea):
Ko Ngāi Tamatea (Te Whakatōhea) tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whakatōhea. Ko Te Whakatōhea tonu he iwi mai i Te Moana-a-Tairongo (Ōhiwa), ki Ōpōtiki, tae noa ki Ōpape e noho ana

Ngāti Ira (Te Whakatōhea):
Ko Ngāti Ira (Te Whakatōhea) tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whakatōhea. Ko Te Whakatōhea tonu he iwi mai i Te Moana-a-Tairongo (Ōhiwa), ki Ōpōtiki, tae noa ki Ōpape e noho ana

Ngāti Ngahere:
Ko Ngāti Ngahere tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whakatōhea. Ko Te Whakatōhea tonu he iwi mai i Te Moana-a-Tairongo (Ōhiwa), ki Ōpōtiki, tae noa ki Ōpape e noho ana

Ngāti Patumoana:
Ko Ngāti Patumoana tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whakatōhea. Ko Te Whakatōhea tonu he iwi mai i Te Moana-a-Tairongo (Ōhiwa), ki Ōpōtiki, tae noa ki Ōpape e noho ana

Ngāti Rua (Te Whakatōhea):
Ko Ngāti Rua (Te Whakatōhea) tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whakatōhea. Ko Te Whakatōhea tonu he iwi mai i Te Moana-a-Tairongo (Ōhiwa), ki Ōpōtiki, tae noa ki Ōpape e noho ana

Te Ūpokorehe:
Ko Te Ūpokorehe tētahi o ngā hapū o Te Whakatōhea. Ko Te Whakatōhea tonu he iwi mai i Te Moana-a-Tairongo (Ōhiwa), ki Ōpōtiki, tae noa ki Ōpape e noho ana

Ngāi Tai (Waikato):
Ko Ngāi Tai (Waikato) he iwi o Mataatua waka kei Waikato e noho ana.

Ngā Pōtiki (Ngāi Tai):
Ko Ngā Pōtiki (Ngāi Tai) tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tai (Waikato), he iwi o Mataatua waka kei Waikato e noho ana.

Ngāti Ririwhenua:
Ko Ngāti Ririwhenua tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tai (Waikato), he iwi o Mataatua waka kei Waikato e noho ana.

Te Aitanga-a-Te Rako:
Ko Te Aitanga-a-Te Rako tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāi Tai (Waikato), he iwi o Mataatua waka kei Waikato e noho ana.

Ngāti Rangi (Mataatua):
Ko Ngāti Rangi (Mataatua) he iwi o Mataatua waka.

Ngāti Manawa (Mataatua):
Ko Ngāti Manawa (Mataatua) he iwi kei Murupara e noho ana. Ko Tawhiuau te maunga tapu , ko Rangitāiki te awa, ko Mataatua te waka, ko Ngāti Manawa te iwi.

Ngāti Hui:
Ko Ngāti Hui tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Manawa o Mataatua waka, he iwi kei Murupara e noho ana. Ko Tawhiuau te maunga tapu , ko Rangitāiki te awa, ko Mataatua te waka, ko Ngāti Manawa te iwi.

Ngāti Koro:
Ko Ngāti Koro tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Manawa o Mataatua waka, he iwi kei Murupara e noho ana. Ko Tawhiuau te maunga tapu , ko Rangitāiki te awa, ko Mataatua te waka, ko Ngāti Manawa te iwi.

Ngāti Moewhare:
Ko Ngāi Moewhare tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Manawa iwi. Kei runga i te niao o Te Arawa me Mātaatua i Te Ika Whenua, ki Murupara e noho ana. Ko Tāwhiuau te maunga. Ko Rangitāiki.

Ngāti Tokowaru:
Ko Ngāti Tokowaru tētahi o ngā hapū o Ngāti Manawa o Mataatua waka, he iwi kei Murupara e noho ana. Ko Tawhiuau te maunga tapu , ko Rangitāiki te awa, ko Mataatua te waka, ko Ngāti Manawa te iwi.

Calamus gamblei:
Ko Calamus gamblei he momo o te puninga huaota Calamus. He ahua rite tēnei tipu ki te Nīkau o Aotearoa, engari he tipu kake rākau tēnei. Ko te ingoa reo Pākehā he "rattan palm".

Ko Calamus vidalianus he momo o te puninga huaota Calamus. He ahua rite tēnei tipu ki te Nīkau o Aotearoa, engari he tipu kake rākau tēnei. Ko te ingoa reo Pākehā he "rattan palm".

Ko Calamus viminalis he momo o te puninga huaota Calamus. He ahua rite tēnei tipu ki te Nīkau o Aotearoa, engari he tipu kake rākau tēnei. Ko te ingoa reo Pākehā he "rattan palm".

Calamus zonatus:

Kāhui o ‘Enata:
Ko ngā Kāhui o ‘Enata (Marquesas) he kāhui moutere i Te Moana-nui-a-Kiwa. Ko Te Henua (K)enana te ingoa ki tā te reo o ngā moutere ki te raki; ko Te Fenua `Enata kē ki tā te reo o ngā moutere ki te tonga. Ko te whakamārama o aua ingoa, ko Te Whenua Tangata. 
Mātai matawhenua.
Ka noho te Kāhui o ‘Enata kei nga pae 9ºS, 139º 30W. E 600 ki te 1,000 km te tawhiti i te weheruatanga o te ao; e 1,600 km i Tahiti-nui. E rua ngā wehenga o ngā moutere nei: tuatahi, ko ngā moutere o te tokerau; tuarua, ko ngā moutere o te tonga. E 1,274 km² te rahi o te kāhui moutere nei. Haunga atu i Motu One, he maunga puia ngā moutere katoa nei. 
Ko ngā moutere o te tokerau e kīia nei ko Eïao, Hatutu (Hatutaa), Motu One, me Nuku Hiva: Motu Iti (Hatu Iti), Ua Pou, Motu `Oa and Ua Huka. Ko ngā moutere o te tonga ko Fatu Uku, Tahuata, Moho Tani (Motane), Terihi, Fatu Hiva, Motu Nao (Thomasset Rock), me Hiva `Oa.
Ngā Tāngata.
He poronīhia anō ngā tangata o ngā moutere nei. I ū mai rātou i te tau 100AD pea. Ko te whakaaro, i ahu mai rātou i ngā moutere o Hāmoa.

Seville:
Ko Seville (Sevilla, reo Pāniora) he tāone nui i te takiwā o Andalusia. Koia tonu te tāone matua o te Porowini o Sevilla i Pāniora.

Cape Reinga:
Ko Cape Reinga he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Houhora:
Ko Houhora he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Kaitāia e 41 kiromita ki te tonga, ko Te Kao e 24 kiromita ki te raki mā uru, ko Waiharara e 22 kiromita ki te tonga mā rāwhiti.
E ai ki te kautenui o te tau 2006, e 837 te taupori o Houhora. Mai i te kautenui o te 2001, e 78 te hekenga iho o te tokomaha tāngata.

Pukenui:
Ko Pukenui he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko te kura o Pukenui he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Ko 3 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 75 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Cable Bay:
Ko Cable Bay he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Ko Taipa he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. Wainui:
Ko Wainui he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu taua wāhi rā. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Waitoki e 5.5 kiromita ki te tonga mā uru, ko Orewa e 10 kiromita ki te rāwhiti.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Wainui he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Nō te tau 1879 i whakatū ai. Ko 10 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 218 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Kāeo:
Ko Kāeo he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
E ai ki te kautenui o te tau 2006, e 495 te taupori o te wāhi nei, ā, he rite tonu te tokomaha tāngata ki tō te tau 2001.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Kerikeri e 22 kiromita ki te tonga mā rāwhiti.
Ko ngā kura.
Ko Te Kura Tuatahi o Kāeo he kura mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 6. Nō te tau 1877 i whakatū ai. Ko 3 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 90 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.
Ko Te Kāreti o Whangaroa he kura tuarua mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 7 tae noa ki te 15. Ko 2 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 154 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Orotere:
Ko Orotere he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Mangamuka he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 6. Ko 2 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 24 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Herekino e 26 kiromita ki te hauāuru, ko Mangamuka Bridge e 26 kiromita ki te rāwhiti.
Ko Te Kura Takiwa O Manganuiowae he kura hiato mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 15. Nō te tau 1908 i whakatū ai. Ko 1 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 135 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Herekino:

E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Kaitāia e 26 kiromita ki te raki mā rāwhiti, ko Broadwood e 21 kiromita ki te rāwhiti.
E ai ki te kautenui o te tau 2006, e 1950 te taupori o Herekino. Mai i te kautenui o te 2001, e 105 te hekenga iho o te tokomaha tāngata.
Ko te kura o Herekino he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Ko 2 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 61 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ko Awaroa he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Whangaruru he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Nō te tau 2005 i whakatū ai. Ko 1 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 55 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ko Horeke he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko te kura o Horeke he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 6. Ko 1 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 23 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Mangungu:
Ko Mangungu he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. Ko te kura.

Ko 3 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 52 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ko Oue he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Hikurangi e 22 kiromita ki te tonga mā rāwhiti.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Whananaki he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Ko 5 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 43 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ko Riponui he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Ko Wekaweka he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. Pipiwai:
Ko Pipiwai he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Whangārei-terenga-paraoa e 35 kiromita ki te tonga mā uru, ko Titoki e 16 kiromita ki te tonga.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Pipiwai he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Ko 5 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 44 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ngunguru:
Ko Ngunguru he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Whangārei-terenga-paraoa e 26 kiromita ki te tonga mā uru.
E ai ki te kautenui o te tau 2006, e 1425 te taupori o Ngunguru. Mai i te kautenui o te 2001, e 135 te pikinga ake o te tokomaha tāngata.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Ngunguru he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Ko 7 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 196 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ko Pataua he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Poroti:
Ko Poroti he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Titoki e 7 kiromita ki te hauāuru, ko Maungatapere e 8 kiromita ki te rāwhiti.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Poroti he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Nō te tau 1879 i whakatū ai. Ko 6 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 37 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Taraunui:
Ko Taraunui he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Maungatapere:
Ko Maungatapere he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Whangārei-terenga-paraoa e 11 kiromita ki te rāwhiti, ko Tangiteroria e 18 kiromita ki te tonga mā uru.
E ai ki te kautenui o te tau 2006, e 1281 te taupori o Maungatapere. Mai i te kautenui o te 2001, e 228 te pikinga ake o te tokomaha tāngata.
Ko te kura o Maungatapere he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Nō te tau 1879 i whakatū ai. Ko 9 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 193 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko te kura o Maungakaramea he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Nō te tau 1875 i whakatū ai. Ko 9 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 103 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Tangihua:
Ko Tangihua he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Maungakaramea e 5 kiromita ki te raki mā uru, ko Waiotira e 9 kiromita ki te tonga mā uru.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Tauraroa he kura hiato mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 15. Ko 7 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 393 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Redhill:
Ko Redhill he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Tomarata he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Ko 7 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 120 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Pakiri:
Ko Pakiri he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Leigh e 9 kiromita ki te tonga mā rāwhiti.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Pakiri he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Nō te tau 1877 i whakatū ai. Ko 6 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 20 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Whangateau:
Ko Whangateau he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

Ko Point Wells he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.

E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Matakana:
Ko Matakana he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Warkworth e 9 kiromita ki te tonga mā uru, ko Snells Beach e 9 kiromita ki te tonga, ko Omaha e 7 kiromita ki te rāwhiti, ko Leigh e 13 kiromita ki te raki mā rāwhiti.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Matakana he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 6. Nō te tau 1862 i whakatū ai. Ko 9 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 382 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Tapora:
Ko Tapora he nohanga o Te Tai-tokerau. E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Te Tai-tokerau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa; koia tonu te rohe o Ngā Puhi me ērā atu iwi rongonui o reira.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Tapora he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Ko 6 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 54 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Streamlands:
Ko Streamlands he nohanga o te takiwā o Tāmaki-makau-rau, i roto anō i te rohe whenua o Ākarana-ki-te-raki (AK). E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Tāmaki-makau-rau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa, kei Te Ika-a-Māui taua takiwā.

Ko Kaipara Flats he nohanga o te takiwā o Tāmaki-makau-rau, i roto anō i te rohe whenua o Ākarana-ki-te-raki (AK). Malaga:
Ko "Malaga" tetahi tāone nui i te takiwā o Andalusia. Koia tonu te tāone matua o te Porowini o Malaga i Pāniora.

E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Tāmaki-makau-rau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa, kei Te Ika-a-Māui taua takiwā.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Parakai e 22 kiromita ki te tonga mā rāwhiti, ko South Head e 14 kiromita ki te raki mā uru.
Ko te kura.
Ko te kura o Waioneke he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 8. Nō te tau 1928 i whakatū ai. Ko 7 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 81 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ko Makarau he nohanga o te takiwā o Tāmaki-makau-rau, i roto anō i te rohe whenua o Ākarana-ki-te-raki (AK). Red Beach:
Ko Red Beach he nohanga o te takiwā o Tāmaki-makau-rau, i roto anō i te rohe whenua o Ākarana-ki-te-raki (AK). E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Tāmaki-makau-rau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa, kei Te Ika-a-Māui taua takiwā.
E ai ki te kautenui o te tau 2006, e 6318 te taupori o Red Beach. Mai i te kautenui o te 2001, e 660 te pikinga ake o te tokomaha tāngata.
Ko ngā kura.
Ko te kura o Red Beach he kura tuatahi mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 6. Nō te tau 1989 i whakatū ai. Ko 9 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 643 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.
Ko KingsWay School he kura hiato mō ngā taitama me ngā kōhine o ngā taumata 1 tae noa ki te 15. Ko 10 te whakatauranga ōtekau; ā, e 968 te tokomaha o te rārangi ingoa.

Ko Kaukapakapa he nohanga o te takiwā o Tāmaki-makau-rau, i roto anō i te rohe whenua o Ākarana-ki-te-raki (AK). E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Helensville e 12 kiromita ki te tonga mā uru, ko Araparera e 14 kiromita ki te raki.
E ai ki te kautenui o te tau 2006, e 2,979 te taupori o Kaukapakapa. Mai i te kautenui o te 2001, e 711 te pikinga ake o te tokomaha tāngata.

E ai ki Toitū Te Whenua, he nohanga (he 'locality' rānei ki te reo Pākehā) he wāhi nohoia e te tangata, engari kāore anō kia tae te nui o te taupori ki te nui e taea ai te kī he tāone tonu tēnei. Ko Tāmaki-makau-rau tētahi o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa, kei Te Ika-a-Māui taua takiwā.
Ko ngā wāhi e pātata ana, ko Helensville e 3 kiromita ki te tonga mā rāwhiti, ko Waioneke e 22 kiromita ki te raki mā uru.
E ai ki te kautenui o te tau 2006, e 1371 te taupori o Parakai. Mai i te kautenui o te 2001, e 192 te pikinga ake o te tokomaha tāngata.
