Ngāti Pūkenga:
Ko Ngāti Pūkenga he iwi nui, nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Pūkenga ki Waiau:
Ko Ngāti Pūkenga ki Waiau he iwi nui, nō Waikato, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Porou ki Hauraki:
Ko Ngāti Porou ki Hauraki / Ngati Porou ki Harataunga ki Mataora he iwi nui, nō Waikato, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Mutunga:
Ko Ngāti Mutunga he iwi nui, nō Taranaki, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Manuhiri:
Ko Ngāti Manuhiri he iwi nui, nō Tāmaki Makaurau, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Manawa:
Ko Ngāti Manawa he iwi nui, nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Kuia:
Ko Ngāti Kuia he iwi nui, nō Te Waipounamu, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Korokī Kahukura:
Ko Ngāti Korokī Kahukura / Ngāti Koraki he iwi nui, nō Waikato, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Tahu – Ngāti Whaoa:
Ko Ngāti Tahu – Ngāti Whaoa he iwi nui, nō Waikato me Te Moana-a-Toi, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Ruapani:
Ko Ngāti Ruapani / Ngāti Ruapani ki Waikaremoana he iwi nui, nō Te Matau-a-Māui, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Rongomai:
Ko Ngāti Rongomai he iwi nui, nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Maru (Taranaki):
Ko Ngāti Maru / Te Iwi o Maruwharanui he iwi nui, nō Taranaki me Manawatū-Whanganui, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Waikato Tainui:
Ko Waikato Tainui / Waikato / Tainui he iwi nui, nō Waikato me Tāmaki Makaurau, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Te Wairoa (iwi):
Ko Te Wairoa he iwi nui, o Ngāti Kahungunu me Ngāti Rongomaiwahine, nō Te Tairāwhiti me Te Matau-a-Māui, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Whare:
Ko Ngāti Whare he hapū o Tuhoe, nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Whakahemo:
Ko Ngāti Whakahemo he iwi nui, nō Te Moana-a-Toi, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Wai:
Ko Ngāti Wai / Ngātiwai he iwi nui, nō Te Tai Tokerau me Tāmaki Makaurau, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Tūmatakōkiri:
Ko Ngāti Tūmatakōkiri he iwi nui, nō Te Waipounamu, Aotearoa.

Ngāti Tukorehe:
Ko Ngāti Tukorehe he iwi nui, nō Manawatū-Whanganui, Te Ika-a-Māui, Aotearoa.

Tauira-mai-Tawhiti:
Ko Tauira-mai-Tawhiti te waka tupuna o Te Whānau-ā-Apanui.

Rārangi whare pupuri taonga o Aotearoa:
Ko ētahi ēnei o ngā whare pupuri taonga nō Aotearoa.

Rārangi hōhipere o Aotearoa:
Ko ētahi ēnei o ngā hōhipere/hōhipera/ōhipera nō Aotearoa.

Edgar Allan Poe:
Edgar Allan Poe (Whanautanga: 1809, i, Hononga-o-Amerika ., - Hemonga: 1849, i, Hononga-o-Amerika.), i whakaarohia e te tini ko te papa o te koreo mo nga kaitirotiro hou, he Kaitui, i whanau i te Hanuere 19, 1809, i, Boston, Massachusetts.

Soađegilli:
Ko Soađegilli (reo Whinirana: "Sodankylä", reo Sami-ki-te-raki: "Soađegilli", reo Sami Ānāra: "Suáđigil", reo Sami Skolt: "Suäʹđjel") he tāoe iti ki Whinirana ki te taha tokerau o Ūropi.

Kara o Belgorod:
Ko te haki o Belgorod tetahi o nga tohu whaimana (me te koti o nga ringaringa) o te pa o Belgorod, Belgorod Region, Russian Federation. Ko te haki he tohu mo te kotahitanga me te taunekeneke o nga tangata o te taone nui.
Ua fariihia te reva o teie nei i te 22 no tiurai 1999 na roto i te faaotiraa a te apooraa a te oire no Belgorod no te mau tiaau no 321 e ua tomo atu i roto i te buka parau faatianiani a te Fenua Rusia e te numera rehitaraa 978 i te matahiti 2002.
Whakaahuatanga.
Ko te haki o te taone nui o Belgorod (he kowaiwai puru me te karaehe ma ki raro) e whakaatu ana i te raiona kowhai e tu ana i runga i ona waewae o muri me te ekara ma e rere ana i runga ake. Ko nga tohu o te taone nui atu i te 300 tau, ka puta mai i te wa o te kingitanga o Peter I. I tukuna e te tsar Russian te koti o nga patu ki nga tangata o Belgorod hei whakanui i te wikitoria o nga Swedes i te pakanga o Poltava (1709). I roto i te 1712, ko te koti o nga ringa i whakaatuhia i runga i te kara o te roopu Belgorod, i hinga i te hoariri, a, i te tau 1727 ka waiho hei tohu mo te kawanatanga hou.

Bydgoszcz:
He taone nui i te rohe o Kuyavian-Pomeranian Voivodeship no Poroni
tetahi o nga whakapaipai e rua o tenei kawanatanga
i whakaturia hei pa pukepuke i te tau 1069
ko te 8 te taone nui rawa atu o Poroni
kaupapa here.
Ko Rafał Bruski te perehitini
Ko te whare herehere nui rawa atu o Porana

Ka Toto:
Ko Ka Toto (Ingoa i te reo Ingarahi: There Will Be Blood) tētahi kiriata whakaari whakamataku nō Amerika i hanga i te tau 2007, nā Paul Thomas Anderson i tuhi me tohu. Ka whakaohooho tangatanga noa iho te kiriata e te pukapuka, ko "Hinu!" (Ingoa i te reo Ingarahi: "Oil!"), nā Upton Sinclair. Ka Daniel Day-Lewis te tuahangata e haka, ko Daniel Plainview tōna ingoa; he kaihaurapa hiriwa i te wā kua hipa, ka whai hoki ia te rawa o hinu urutapu i te angtitūtanga hinu urutapu kei roto i Karapōnia, i te tīmatatanga o te rautau rua tekau. Ko Paul Dano, Kevin J. O'Connor, Ciarán Hinds, me Dillon Freasier, kei roto rātou hoki i te kiriata. 
Ka whakaputahia te kiriata e te Kamapene Kiriata Ghourlardi, ā, ka tuaritia e Paramount Vintage me Ngā Kiriata Miramax. Ki te 2008 Hui Ahurei Kiriata-o-Makau-Rau-Whenua i Pearīni, i whiwhi a Ka Toto te Pea Hiriwa mā te Ringa Tohu pai atu o te tau. I whiwhi te kiriata hoki tētahi whakamānawa motuhake mā te titonga tōpū, nā Johnny Greenwood e hanga. I hanga te kiriata kei roto i Tekahaha nō te pūtea o NZD$38.7 miriona, ā, ka whiwhi he utu o $118 miriona. 
He tino pai ki a ngā kaarotake te kiriata Ka Toto mā te toi pikitia, te tohu o Anderson, te tuhinga, titonga tōpū, me te mahi o Day-Lewis me Dano hoki. Ka whiwhi a Day Lewis he pio o ngā whakamānawa, ko te Oscar hei te tino kiriwhakaari tāne. E ki a he maha o te kaarotake, ko Ka Toto tētahi tino pai atu kiriata o tēnei rautau katoa.
He Pakiwaitara.
I te tau 1898, ka pāhua atu hoki te konganuku o te tangata whenua o Amerika e te Pākehā. Ka kite rā a tētahi Pākehā Amerika, ko Daniel Plainview, he hirawa kei haurapa kau ana ia kei roto i tōna maina ki Mēhiko Hou. E mea ana ia kia hoki atu ki te whenua, engari, ka hinga iho ia, ā, ka tāwhatiwhati tōna waewae. I kūmea ia tonu tōna tīnana mai i te rua, he anake. Kātahi, ka mau a Matua Daniel te hirawa ki tētahi whare arotake o konganuku. Ka whakamana te kaiarotake ki a Matua Daniel; ka āhei e a ia kia hīkitia atu he maha o te hirawa, me kōura rānei, mai i te whenua. I te tau 1902, ka kite a Matua Daniel he hinu urutapu mai i te whenua o te Tangata Tongva (he taitata ki Ngā Ānahera ki Karapōnia). Ka tīmata ia tētahi kamapene hou, ka pāhua atu ia he hinu urutapu kia hoko. Ua ka mate tētahi kaimahi i te aituā, he mahi whakapani tōna tāne kōhungahunga. Ka whāngai tōna tāne e Matua Daniel. Ko te tāne (ko H.W. tōna ingoa) te hoa kaipakihi o Matua Daniel, engari ki te whakaaro o te kōrero anake. Me te aha, tinihangatia ai a ngā kaiwhakarato moni e Matua Daniel, nāna nei i rūkahu ki a rātou mō te teka o te "tangata whānau" ia.
I te tau 1911, ka whakatata atu a Matua Daniel e Paul Sunday, he rangatahi, nāna nei i kōrero atu o tētahi kenepuru hinu urutapu kei raro i te kāinga o tōna whānau, ki te taone o Little Boston. Ka hīkoi Matua Daniel rāua ko H.W. ki te kāinga kōra. I tūtaki a Matua Daniel e Eli Sunday, ko te māhanga tino ōrite o Paul ia. He kaikauhau pōrangi a Eli i Little Boston; ka whakapono hoki ia he poropiti ia. Ka mahi nanakia a Matua Daniel. Ka whakamātau ia kia māminga te whānau kia whakapono ka pīrangi kia mahi manu ia te koera ki kōnei, nā reira ka taea a ia kia kaitaonga te whenua mā te utu noa iho o $3,700. Kīhai a Eli e whakapono te rūkahu, nō te mea i mōhio ia o te ranea o hinu urutapu kei raro i te whenua nei. Ka tono a Eli he utu o $10,000, kia hanga tōna hāhi, ki te whakawhiti te whenua ki Matua Daniel. Āminetia ana e te iwi. Ka kaitaonga te whenua katoa e Matua Daniel, hāunga te whenua o tētahi kiritata, kō William Bandy, nō te mea kīhai a Matua Daniel e manatū kia whiriwhiri me ko Bandy rāua i te hokonga o te whenua. 
Ka tīmata a Matua Daniel me ōna kaimahi kia hanga tō rātou puna hinu urutapu. Tonutonu mai a Eli ki a Matua Daniel hei āheitanga kia whakapai ai te puna, kia kore ai e mau te hapori e te puna me tōna mahi hao kino. E mea ana a Matua Daniel kia tuku a Eli kia whakapai, engari ua tae mai te rā o te tīmata, ka whātuturi a Daniel ki te pīrangi o te rangatahi pōrangi. Haurapatia ai mō te hinu urutapu, engari, he aituā e rua i te haere. Ka mate a tētahi kaimahi, ko Joe Gundha, nō te mea ka hinga iho tētahi kurupae kei runga i tōna upoko. Kātahi, pakū ana te haurehu mai te puna, turikere tērā ngā taringa i a H.W. Ka urupatua te tīrewa puna e te ahi nō te pakū hoki. E ai ki a Eli, i haere te aituā nō te mea kīhai a Matua Daniel e tuku ki a ia kia whakamānawa tika te puna. Me hoki, kāore anō a Matua Daniel kia utu mai ki a Eli te moni i taurangitia. Ka tono a Eli ki a Matua Daniel mā te moni, engari ka patua me whakapāpaku a Eli e Daniel. A te pō nei, ka patua a te matua o Eli e tōna tāne, nā te mea i hinga iho ia ki te whakangaio a Matua Daniel. 
Ka tae mai tētahi tangata ki te tatau o te whare o Matua Daniel, ka kī a ia ko Henry tōna ingoa. E ki a Henry, ko te teina haurua o Matua Daniel ia, nō te taha o tō rāua matua. Ka pai te tūtaki, ā, ka whakamahia a Henry e Matua Daniel. Ka tutungi a H.W. tō rātou whare ki mate ai a Henry, nā te mea he hae a H.W. o te whanaungatanga kei wanganui o Henry me Matua Daniel. Tineia katoa te ahi e te tāngata e rua. Ka tukua atu a H.W e Matua Daniel ki tētahi kura mā tangata pūwharawhara, ki Hana Paraniko. Ka pīrangi tētahi kaiwhakarite nō Standard Oil kia hoko te whenua hinu urutapu i kaitaonga a Matua Daniel. Ka āmine a Matua Daniel kia tuku tana puna hinu urutapu i hanga ki Ngā Puke Coyote, engari ka meko ia āna whenua hinu urutapu ki Little Boston. Mahue kē ka āmine a Matua Daniel ki tētahi whakaaetanga me Union Oil (he hoa kakari o Standard Oil), kia hanga tētahi ngongo kōhinu ki te tai Karapōnia. Engari, kei taumahatanga ai te whenua o Bandy mō Matua Daniel. 

Jeremy Zucker:
Ko Jeremy Zucker (3 Poutū-te-rangi 1996, New Jersey) he kaiwaiata nō Hononga-o-Amerika.

Mahimaina:
Ko Mahimaina () he pouaka kirikiri a Huitene me te kēmu atāta ora. Koinei te kēmu rongonui i te ao. I roto i te mahinga auaha, ka taea e ngā kaitakaro te hanga tata i ngā mea katoa. I te oranga tonutanga, me tarai ngā kaitakaro ki te ora. E wātea ana a Mahimaina i te reo Māori i te rorohiko.

Kirihi Hipikini:
Ko Kirihi Hipikini he kaitōrangapū nō Aotearoa. I tenei wa ko ia te Pirimia o Aotearoa me te kaihautu o te Rōpū Reipa.

Tōni Apōti:
Ko Tōni Apōti () he kaitōrangapū o mua o Ahitereiria. I noho ia hei Pirimia 28 o Ahitereiria mai i te 2013 ki te 2015. Ko ia ano te kaiarahi mo te Rōpū Rīpera mai i te tau 2009 ki te tau 2015.

Anatoni Arapanihi:
Ko Anatoni Arapanihi () he kaitōrangapū nō Ahitereiria. Ko ia te 31 o te Pirimia o Ahitereiria mai i te tau 2022. Ko ia ano te kaihautu mo te Rōpū Reipa mai i te tau 2019.

Joshua Bassett:
Ko Joshua Taylor Bassett (22 Hakihea 2000, Karapōnia) he kaiwaiata nō Hononga-o-Amerika.

Hanshin Tigers:
Ko Hanshin Tigers he kapa poipapaha Hapanihi.
tirohanga whānui.
Ko ngā Hanshin Tigers te tiima poipaparo rongonui rawa atu i Hapani, he maha nga kaiwhaiwhai mate.

Pakanga i ngā Whetu:
Ko Pakanga i ngā Whetu () he raupapa kiriata pakimaero pūtaiao o Amerika. I timata mai hei raupapa pukapuka kōmeke, engari i muri mai ka toro atu ki etahi atu momo papaaho penei i ngā kiriata, kēmu ataata me ngā pukapuka pūrākau, katoa i roto i te ao pakiwaitara kotahi. I hangaia te kiriata tuatahi i te tau 1977 (ko te taitara "" i te reo Pākehā), a, ka tere tonu te ahua o te raupapatanga o te ao rongonui. Koinei tetahi o ngā raupapa kiriata tino angitu o ngā wa katoa. Na George Lucas i hanga a "Pakanga i ngā Whetu", na tana kamupene kiriata a Lucasfilm (kei a Disney inaianei).

Rohe o Aotearoa:
He rārangi tēnei o ngā rohe o Aotearoa ().

Rārangi wharekura o Aotearoa:
He rārangi tēnei o ngā rārangi o ngā wharekura o Aotearoa ().

Te Kaunihera a-Rohe o Te Tai Tokerau:
Ko Te Kaunihera a-Rohe o Te Tai Tokerau () he kaunihera-a-rohe ki te Tai-tokerau, Aotearoa.

Kaunihera o Aotearoa:
He rārangi tēnei o ngā kaunihera o Aotearoa ().

Tāone nui o Aotearoa:
He rārangi tēnei o ngā tāone nui o Aotearoa ().

Rārangi ngā rohe tatauranga o Aotearoa:
He rārangi tēnei o ngā rohe tatauranga o Aotearoa ().

Rārangi rāihe whare hokohoko o Aotearoa:
He rārangi tēnei o ngā rāihe whare hokohoko o Aotearoa ().

Rārangi kaihoko whakamutunga o Aotearoa:
He rārangi tēnei o ngā kaihoko whakamutunga o Aotearoa ().

Te Kaunihera o Tāmaki Makaurau:
Ko Te Kaunihera o Tāmaki Makaurau () he kaunihera-a-rohe ki te Tāmaki-makau-rau, Aotearoa.

Te Kaunihera ā Rohe o Waikato:
Ko Te Kaunihera ā Rohe o Waikato () he kaunihera-a-rohe ki te Waikato, Aotearoa.

Takiwā o Aotearoa:
He rārangi tēnei o ngā takiwā o Aotearoa ().

Rārangi hapū:
Ko ētahi ēnei o ngā hapū Māori nō Aotearoa.

Rārangi ngā hinonga Māori:
Ko ētahi ēnei o ngā hinonga nō Aotearoa.

Kotka:
Ko Kotka he tāone nui ki Whinirana, ki te taha tokerau o Ūropi.
Rāhi: 949.76 km² (271.95 km² oneone, 671.99 km² moana)
Taupori:

Tūpai:
Ko Tūpai (reo Ārapi: دبي, "Dubayy") te tāone nui Emerati.

Āpu Tāpi:
Ko Āpu Tāpi (reo Ārapi: أَبُو ظَبِي, "Abū Ẓabī") te tāone matua Emerati.

Nurmijärvi:
Ko Nurmijärvi he tāone ki Whinirana ki te taha tokerau o Ūropi. 

Hankyu:
He kamupene rerewhenua a Hankyu i Tiapanī.
I whakatūria i te tau 1907.
Ka tūhono atu a Kyoto, o Osaka me Kobe.

Reo Kiraki:
Ko te reo Kiraki (گیلکی ("Giləki")) he reo take Īrāna i kōrero i Kirana Porowini i Īrāna.

Take Īrāna:
Ko ngā reo take Īrāna he rakau i te reo-whanau Īnia-Īrāna nō te reo-whanau Īnia-Ūropi.

Reo Īnia-Īrāna:
Ko ngā reo Īnia-Īrāna he rakau i te reo-whanau Īnia-Ūropi.

Reo Īnia-Ūropi:
Ko ngā reo Īnia-Ūropi (RIU) he reo-whanau ki Ūropi me Āhia.

Reo Tajik:
Ko te reo Tajik (reo Tajik: Забони тоҷикӣ, "Zaboni tojikī", t̞ʰɔ̝dʒiˈkʰiː) he reo take Īrāna, te reo o matua o Tahikitāna me he reo nui i Uhipeketāne.

Reo Kanada:
Ko te reo Kanada (reo Kanada: ಕನ್ನಡ, , reo Pākehā: Kannada) he reo Dravidian i kōrero i Karnataka i Īnia-ki-te-tonga-mā-uru.

Tom Holland:
Ko Tom Holland (1 Hune 1996, Kingston upon Thames) he kaiwhakaari no Ingarangi.

Hākutiki:
Ko Hākutiki (reo Hākuti: "Дьокуускай", "J̌okuuskay", , reo Rūhia: "Якутск") te tāone matua me te tāone nui o Hākutia, Rūhia. Ko 311,760 te taupori i 2018, ko 122 km2 (47 sq mi) te rahi. 
Hītori.
I tīmata te tāone i 1632, ko Hākutiki he tāone nui nō 1643. 

Wāhanga o Rūhia:

Kaliningrad:
Ko Kaliningrad (reo Rūhia: Калининград, IPA: āpānoa 1946: Königsberg (reo Tiamana: "Königsberg" [ˈkøːnɪçsbɛʁk; reo Rūhia: Кёнигсберг, tr. "Kyonigsberg", IPA: ; reo Pōrana: "Królewiec") te tāone nui me te tāone matua o Kaliningrad Opaha i Rūhia.

Rahataua (awa Don):
Ko Rahataua (reo Rūhia: Росто́в-на-Дону́, "Rostov-na-Donu", IPA: nə dɐˈnu) he wāpu-tāone i Rahataua Opaha i te rohe o Rohe Rūhia-ki-te-tonga i Rūhia. I tautohu te tāone i te awa Don.

Rahataua Opaha:
Ko Rahataua Opaha (reo Rūhia: Росто́вская о́бласть, tr. "Rostovskaya oblast", IPA: ˈobləsʲtʲ) he wāhanga o Rūhia (he opaha), i tauwāhi i Rohe Rūhia-ki-te-tonga. E 100,800 km2 (38,900 sq mi) te rahi. E 4,200,729 (nō te 2021 kautetanga) te taupori. Ko Rahataua Opaha te tuaono rawa nui wāhanga i Rūhia. Ko Rahataua te tāone matua me te tāone nui me te tāone matua o Rūhia-ki-te-tonga nō 2002.

Rohe Rūhia-ki-te-tonga:
Ko te Rohe Rūhia-ki-te-tonga (reo Rūhia: Ю́жный федера́льный о́круг, tr. "Yuzhny federalny okrug", IPA: fʲɪdʲɪˈralʲnɨj ˈokrʊk) tētahi o ngā waru Rohe o Rūhia. Ko Rahataua te tāone matua. 

Rohe o Rūhia:
Ko ngā Rohe o Rūhia (reo Rūhia: федера́льные округа́, romanized: "federalnyye okruga") ngā rōpū o ngā wāhanga o Rūhia. 

Ringikana:
Ko Ringikana (reo Pākehā: "Lincoln") he tāone i Ingarangi.

Reo Marēo:
Ko te reo Marēo he reo Ahiteronīhia, te reo ōkawa o whenua Poronai, Hingapoa, Marēhia, me Initonīhia. Te reo anō hoki ka kōrerohia kei Tīmoa-ki-te-Rāwhiti, Tairana, me Piripīni. Ko te tapeke kaikōrero 290 miriona tāngata (koni ake, iti iho rānei 260 miriona tāngata hei "reo Initonīhia") ki ngā pae o Ahia-ki-te-Rāwhiti-mā-Tonga Oheania ("Maritime Southeast Asia").

Ngā reo Marēo:
Ko ngā reo Marēo he peka o ngā reo Marēo-Porinīhia o te whānau ngā reo Ahiteronīhia.

Jean-Paul Belmondo:
Ko Jean-Paul Belmondo he kaiwhakaari Wīwī, he kaiwhakatere, he kaimekemeke me te kaihanga.

Louis de Funès:
Ko Louis de Funès de Galarza he kaiwhakaari French, he pukuhohe.

Mahathir Mohamad:
Ko Mahathir Mohamad (1925) te Pirimia tuawha me te tuawhitu o Marēhia. E mohiotia ana ia mo te taraiwa i te whanaketanga ohaoha tere-tere me te whakatairanga i te maha o nga hanganga-nui.
